data.text: Nice and big rooms. Nice and very kind customer relationship. Best food and and variety of quality drinks. Lots of bars and restaurants to choose from. Never ending service. One of the best holidays we had ever had. Definitely come back again.
data.title: Perfect experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Onur S, 

Thank you for taking time to share your recent holiday experience at Rixos Sharm El Sheikh! and thank you for sharing such a wonderful comments towards our hotel employees and our services.

We will share your praises with our management team and employees that will keeps them motivated to create an unforgettable experience for our guests.

It’s our pleasure to have you as a guest and we are very much looking forward to welcome you back again soon.

Best regards,
owner_response.author: Aleksandr Nechepurnov

data.text:
My wife and I went here for my 60th Birthday and I can truly say the entire holiday was absolutely spot on.
Every part of my holiday was wonderful and the entire staff, service, dining and entertainment are tops.
It was great sunning it up at the Lagoon Pool while thinking of t he UK getting battered with rain (ha ha)...with a special thanks to the Lagoon Pool bar staff.
We ventured to most of the A-La-Carte restaurants and were never let down, wonderful food and my birthday celebration at the Asian Restaurant......many thanks.
My only criticism is the standard of "cocktails", nothing against Rixos Sharm-El-Sheik, it seems to be everywhere now, nobody (worldwide) makes good cocktails anymore
Would def return again....loved it
data.title: Happy Birthday to me...thank you Rixos

data.text:
We just finished a 10 day / 9 nights. The overall experience was excellent.  Rooms are large, comfortable and very clean, the grounds are beautiful, specialty restaurants delicious and easy to book, and buffet had a nice selection. Michelle from the beach bar and Botros from the heated pool bar were both standout staff. They made this trip even more memorable. 

1. The only cons were the guest that felt they were too entitled. Some were very rude with staff, left garbage everywhere for staff to clean up even though there were plenty of trash cans. Not following pool rules and very loud.

2. After being on many cruises and visiting Caribbean resorts the entertainment wasn't the greatest and could use a bit of an update. Lots of dancing and lip singing. 

3. Even though the buffet opened for late night meal it would be nice to have a late night snack bar that serves things like pizza, burgers and hotdogs in the evenings for folks with late night munchies.
data.title: Fantastic Experience!

data.text:
My friend and I used to holiday with the children, but then our children grew up and we stopped travelling. Last year we decided to try the Rixos adults and wondered how we would be without the entertainment of our children.. Oh my goodness, we were in for a surprise. I now recommend this hotel to every age group I speak to 18+ to 80.
After spending the day on the beautiful beach on the sick, padded loungers, we call at the beach club from 4 pm till 6, where it is "rocking" have a cocktail, then go back to shower in the luxury of a beautiful spacious room. 
In the evening we passed quartets playing along the path's,  cello, saxophone violin, most beautiful- then on to one of the superb à la cart restaurants of our choice. Where the staff seem pleased to see us and welcome us like old friends yet with the respect that we expected. 
We then sit at a bar while we digested, before heading on to the live music, and shows beachfront and bar. 
Always ending  our evening in the lobby bar with a new favourite drink, baby Guinness. 
I'm happy to answer any questions. 
But take it from me, what are you looking for, whatever age, group, or gender, you are. Rixos adults Egypt have it covered 

💥We are putting our money where are mouth is an returning 
April 17, 2024 in   2 WEEKS TIME !!!  
PS Rixos our room was 4008 we would like it again please x
data.title: Simply the best

data.text: The hotel was great , staff was amazing and the quality of everything was terrific . The barmen were very capable of nice drinks , and Margarita from guest relation was really helpful . Hope to go there again in the near future as the last experience left a very good impression , highly recommend it to anyone who is willing to have a great holiday . Thank you Rixos!
data.title: Relaxing Holiday !
